title: Vite Dev Server
description: Starts a dev server using Vite.

buildTarget.description: Target which builds the application. Only used to retrieve the configuration as the dev-server does not build the code.

buildLibsFromSource.description: Read buildable libraries from source instead of building them separately.

proxyConfig.description: Path to the proxy configuration file.

host.description: Specify which IP addresses the server should listen on.

hmr.description: Enable hot module replacement. For more options, use the 'hmr' option in the Vite configuration file.

open.description: Automatically open the app in the browser on server start. When the value is a string, it will be used as the URL's pathname.

cors.description: Configure CORS for the dev server.

mode.description: Mode to run the server in.

clearScreen.description: Set to false to prevent Vite from clearing the terminal screen when logging certain messages.

force.description: Force the optimizer to ignore the cache and re-bundle
